participant_1.background:
I'm curious about my family's history and where we came from.
I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.
I do not have my own home yet.
my wife is a breast cancer survivor.
i work as a tutor for english literature.

participant_2.background:
I met my family through adoption, and I am so grateful to have them in my life.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.
I run for my mom.
i like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items.
I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.

content.text: hey there, how are you doing?
Hi there! I'm doing great, thank you.  How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!  What are your hobbies?
I love to go thrift shopping, recycle what I find, and create new items out of it.  I also love to go running and take care of my health.
That's really cool!  I love to run too.  What inspired you to start running?
I started running a few years ago to help me cope with my mother's cancer diagnosis.  It's been a great way for me to stay active and relieve stress.
That's an amazing reason to start running!  I'm so glad it's been a positive experience for you.
Thank you!  I'm also a big fan of Taylor Swift, so I love going to her concerts.  I just took a friend from out of town to see her last week.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I've never been to a Taylor Swift concert, but I've heard they're amazing.
They are!  She puts on a great show.  What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy working as a tutor for English literature, and I also like creating delicious coffee drinks at my job as a barista.
Those sound like really interesting jobs!  I've always been curious about English literature, but I've never had the chance to take a class in it.
It's a great subject!  I'm happy to answer any questions you have about it.
Thanks!  I might take you up on that offer sometime.  I'm also curious about what it's like to work as a barista.
It's a lot of fun!  I get to meet a lot of interesting people and make delicious coffee.
That sounds like a great job.  I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks!  I'm happy to talk more about my jobs if you'd like.
I'd love to hear more about them!
